code: import{format,isToday,isTomorrow,addDays,startOfDay}from'date-fns';import{es}from'date-fns/locale';export const formatDate=date=>{if(isToday(date)){return"Hoy, ".concat(format(date,'HH:mm'));}else if(isTomorrow(date)){return"Ma\xF1ana, ".concat(format(date,'HH:mm'));}else{return format(date,"d 'de' MMMM, HH:mm",{locale:es});}};export const formatDateOnly=date=>{return format(date,"d 'de' MMMM 'de' yyyy",{locale:es});};export const formatTime=date=>{return format(date,'HH:mm');};export const isAppointmentToday=date=>{return isToday(date);};export const getUpcomingDays=function(){let days=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:7;const dates=[];for(let i=0;i<days;i++){dates.push(addDays(startOfDay(new Date()),i));}return dates;};
